App.name: Feedback App
Home.code: Type the code to give your feedback
Auth.signUpBtn: Don't have an account? Create one

Auth.verifyErrMsg: Wrong verification code. Please, verify and try again.

Auth.requiredFieldsMsg: Favor preencher todos os campos obrigatórios.
Auth.emailInUse: E-mail already taken. If it's yours, click back nd sign in into your account.
